sourcesContent:
import React, {useState} from "react" import AddHikeForm from "./AddHikeForm" export default function HikeCard({props}) { const {hikeName, distance, zipcode, state, elevationGain, difficulty, notes, _id, editHike, hike} = props const [editHikingToggle, setEditHikingToggle] =useState(false) return( <> { !editHikingToggle ?

Name: {hikeName}

Distance: {distance}

State: {state}

Zipcode: {zipcode}

Elevation Gain: {elevationGain}

Difficulty: {difficulty}

Notes: {notes}

: <> } ) }
